name: Boat Battles!
description: Survive in the Seas, defeat sea monsters, and collect loot! Move using (WASD) and your mouse to aim and shoot your onboard cannon, F to pause and upgrade your vessel. Watch out for attacking monsters, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. if you hit land, or get hit by a monster, expect your steering to loose control. Use the collected treasure to upgrade your ship and its defenses! And most importantly, have fun!
